OMS compatible ROM: Substratum
This means you can use all of the awesome new features of Substratum.
Get an OMS compatible ROM
Substratum shines on OMS compatible ROMS. On those ROMs you can change Overlays, Fonts, Sounds and Bootanimations on the fly, without rebooting.
ROM not OMS compatible: Substratum Legacy
You are not on an OMS compatible ROM. This means that Substratum legacy will emulate the functions of Layers Manager for you (and add some extras), but you still have to reboot after changing themes.
